changeSet.ext:documentation: Setup the account database table for user authentication.
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE account ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, last_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, password VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, salt VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP );
